expo.name: Refyne
expo.description: Connect with professional sports coaches for personalized training and feedback.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Refyne needs access to your camera to record videos for coaching feedback and tutorials.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Refyne needs access to your microphone to record audio with coaching videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Refyne needs access to your photo library to select and share coaching videos and images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Refyne needs permission to save coaching videos and images to your photo library.
